BREAKING: IBM stock, $IBM, falls over -10% after Anthropic announces that Claude can streamline COBOL code.

It’s becoming increasingly clear how pivotal the times we are in right now truly are.

posts.text:
As the skeptics are likely to come attack with the shares moving up.  The point about capacity will be continually raised for $hg $hgraf

It’s cookie cutter.  Off the shelf components mostly.   As grok or other ai’s. Texas used to have huge acetylene capacity.  The Ai’s suggest that Texas could ramp up enough acetylene production for $hg to produce 100k tonnes of graphene per year over just 4-7 years.  100k tonnes would be $20 bln a year profit.  Capacity growth can meet explosive demand as it materializes
posts.author: BambroughKevin

posts.text: It’s this sort of potential that has be believing we will see $20-30/ sh in a matter of months as the excitement builds and they list on Nasdaq / get mainstream media coverage.   CNBC, Bloomberg TV,  eventually @jimcramer will be talking about it and @ARKInvest Cathy Wood will be trying to buy shares.  Just like I was 2 years ahead of her on Cameco and the uranium trade… they will come for $hg $hgraf
posts.author: BambroughKevin
